message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $90?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I'm willing to give you a bit more. How about we meet at $87?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
I'm getting a bit concerned about the price, Bob! I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. How about we meet at $84?
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. How about we meet at $81? Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob! I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. How about we meet at $83?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I think we can do even better. How about we meet at $80? Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
